name: Slam Dunk 2: Zenkoku e no Tip Off
description: This title plays much like Slam Dunk: Gakeppuchi no Kesshou League, but there are options to choose the basketball team, the game mode and how many minutes each match should last. Closeups of defense, tackling opponents and scoring and now shown in side-view. Scoring a goal depends on the player getting the basketball on the linear target.
